title: ACTIVITY-DIFFUSION COUPLING IN NEURAL SIGNALLING
abstractText: Physiological interpretation of changes detected with diffusion-weighted MRI in the human brain remains an outstanding medical issue. We believe that the proposed project will provide important insights into this problem and thus will assist in understanding the underlying neural pathologies. Furthermore, a better understanding of the mechanisms that regulate cortical excitability will give us an insight into new approaches to the treatment of epilepsy. MCW frequently appears at public meetings organised by the National Society for Epilepsy and Epilepsy Action, and has helped the BBC establish an information resource on epilepsy (http://www.bbc.co.uk/health/epilepsy/).
